name: In re Peter Paul NAKOSKI, Jr., District Justice In and For Magisterial District 06-3-01. Appeal of Judicial Conduct Board

parties: In re Peter Paul NAKOSKI, Jr., District Justice In and For Magisterial District 06-3-01. Appeal of Judicial Conduct Board.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2000, the order of the Court of Judicial Discipline is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
758 A.2d 1155
In re Peter Paul NAKOSKI, Jr., District Justice In and For Magisterial District 06-3-01. Appeal of Judicial Conduct Board.

Sept. 28, 2000.
